name: Elixir Finance
description: What is the project about? Through a trustless, decentralized protocol, Elixir transforms market making, enabling everyone to easily participate in active market making on centralized and decentralized exchanges What makes your project unique? Elixir is a fully composable protocol, enabling it to also support white label native exchange integrations, unlocking retail liquidity for algorithmic market making. Elixir can actively provision targeted liquidity on central limit orderbooks and concentrated liquidity AMMs onchain, while providing retail DeFi users with a single venue to deploy active liquidity frictionlessly across DEXs and CEXs. History of your project. Started in Feb 2022, seed round was supported by Kucoin, Quantstamp, Avalanche Ventures, Gate, Arthur Hayes. Whatâ€™s next for your project? Mainnet is being planned for. What can your token be used for? Staking and governance.
